column5: Just recieved a used Autopilot in the mail today, no instructions...I figured out how the compass device mounts, but I can't figure out how to secure that black square piece...I don't want it flopping around...  Can anyone explain or better yet post a picture???  4 screws on the underside of the head hold the top on...
Please see if this video will help:    or  Minn Kota web site: http://www.minnkotamotors.com/products/accessories/ipilot/freshwater.aspx
Ok, that helps...I have it installed...Only one wire connector...But it doesn't work! Agghhhh!
You might want to pm whiskeywizard. He knows a thing or two besides the whisky.  Slayer
It works fine...Just didn't at first for no explainable reason...Thanks for the help.
Google the instructions for your TM. I know I found them for the PD I bought off you last year (btw, it works great). I don't rmrmber if it was off minnkotas website or not.
